description:
Pregnancy Calculator can predict the probable date of conception, the start date of the second trimesters and fertility dates.
It also calculates the dates that most babies may arrive between and more obvious things that you should know anyway-like how many weeks and days you are pregnant. 
For those that really like to hit the nail on the head, you can even tell Pregnancy Calculator on which day you want the baby to be born (useful if you are trying to give birth around a major holiday or event), and it will advise you on exactly what day you'll need to have a shot at conceiving. Much of what this program offers most parents to be should be able to calculate anyway but if you have busy lives or are bad with dates, it could make the process a while lot more fun.

Features:
* Determine the due date.

* Calculate the likely conception date.

* Calculate the end of the first and second trimesters.

* Estimate the fetal age.

* Determine the likely conception date when you know the birthday.
